Package com.googlecode.catchexception

package com.googlecode.catchexception
This public package contains the primary API to catch and verify exceptions. You find more information in CatchException.
  • Related Packages
    Package
    Description
    com.googlecode.catchexception.apis
    This public package contains alternative APIs to catch and verify exceptions.
    com.googlecode.catchexception.throwable
    This public package contains the primary API to catch and verify throwables.
  • Class
    Description
    CatchException
    The methods of this class catch and verify exceptions in a single line of code and make them available for further analysis.
    ExceptionCaptor
     
    ExceptionHolder
    Holds a caught exception per Thread.
    ExceptionNotThrownAssertionError
    Thrown if a method has not thrown an exception of the expected type.
    ExceptionUtil
    Code borrowed from famous Spock Framework
    ThrowingCallable
